extendedInfo.description: After the Great Earthquake of 3030 a seemingly bottomless hole has been found in the bottom of the ocean.  You have been selected to be the pilot of an elite group of explorers chosen to investigate The Void!Use the accelerometer as your steering wheel as you dive deep beneath the Earth's crust while dodging the cavern's walls and shooting down debris with your limited supply of missiles.  As you careen down the void, be sure to use your brake in emergencies to get out of hairy situations.But beware!  The deeper you explore the faster the ship accelerates and the larger the debris get!  Can you find what is at the bottom of The Void?

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great game made by a fellow andengine developper! Great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fun!  My kids really like it too
reviews.author: A Google User
